text: The best soy pudding (beancurd) I've ever tried. Purchased at Sheng Siong (231 Sumang Lane outlet), and damnnnn it's the bomb! The soya milk is normal, but the pudding guys... has this bubblegum-like aftertaste. ðŸ¤¤

never been to the shop physically but i first discovered this soya drink in sheng siong. and got hooked ever since. itâ€™s creamy yet still light enough, not too sweet and does not leave an after taste. like most other soya drinks do. this is just perfect!

Went in the afternoon and had purchased the coupon from lazada.

One of the Vietnamese girls requested to bring my mobile phone nearer to her (phone was just placed right above the counter top of the cash register & she could not view although the screen facing her) and informed she could not see without her specs.

Ok that done, and redeemed the coupons while screen facing her, and she seemed blur could not tally though informed her the total and types had purchased ðŸ¤”. Her Vietnamese colleague readily look at the screen on mobile, asked to show date of redemption ðŸ¤¦, luckily she knows whereabout to locate although had redeemed the coupon right in front of the earlier staff.

The soy tasted nice, first time trying matcha soy and not much matcha taste, too light. Will go with the original.

Unique take on the traditional beancurd. Apart from beancurd and soya milk, this outlet also sells muah chee and waffle as well as their very own gelato. There are also seating areas for diners to dine in.

First came across their soy beancurd and soy bean drink while grocery shopping at a Sheng Siong outlet. Contacted them via direct message on instagram to enquire about about their halal certification and was attended to very efficiently by their staff. Thank you for the good and fast service. Beancurd and drink tastes delightful; with just the right amount of sweetness. Grateful to find halal beancurd and soybean drink!
- Jen
